thread.title: Connor McDavid keeps cool ahead of National Hockey League debut
thread.title_full: Connor McDavid keeps cool ahead of National Hockey League debut

author: MARTY KLINKENBERG
title: Connor McDavid keeps cool ahead of National Hockey League debut
text:
St. Louis Blues defencemen Carl Gunnarsson, left, and Kevin Shattenkirk double-team Edmonton Oilers phenom Connor McDavid during the first period of his NHL debut at the Scottrade Center in St. Louis on Oct. 8. (Jasen Vinlove/USA Today Sports) Connor McDavid keeps cool ahead of National Hockey League debut MARTY KLINKENBERG ST. LOUIS — The Globe and Mail 
Published Thursday, Oct. 08, 2015 10:14PM EDT 
Last updated Thursday, Oct. 08, 2015 10:22PM EDT 
The morning skate complete, Lauri Korpikoski headed down a tunnel beneath the stands at the Scottrade Center. Spying a pack of newshounds outside the Edmonton Oilers dressing room, the Finnish winger stopped and flashed a smile. 
“I know you guys are waiting for me,” Korpikoski said. “It happens like this everywhere I go.” connect with us The Globe and Mail Newspaper
